p: An experimental laboratory intervention was designed at the Institute of Biology and Poisoning, School of Medicine, Baqiyatallah University of Medical Sciences. The studied samples included standard species (ATCC) Candida albicans (ATCC 90028) and Candida glabrata, both of which were obtained from the Mycology Laboratory of the School of Veterinary Medicine, University of Tehran. The present study was carried out using pure cinnamaldehyde (purchased from Merck Germany) and nystatin (purchased from Sigma).
